data.title: U.S. government has authorized commercial ferry service to Cuba

Qatar detained German reporters investigating FIFA World Cup | Journalists from Germany’s biggest television networks were reportedly detained, questioned and not allowed to leave Qatar for days while working on a story about FIFA President & Doha’s vexed nomination for the 2022 football World Cup.

After 17 years of fruitlessly searching the galaxy, Australian scientists have discovered the source of mysterious radio signals hitting a telescope

Astronomers have discovered a baby blue galaxy that is farther away in distance and time than any galaxy ever seen. It's among the universe's first generation of galaxies, from 13.1 billion years ago.
